item.title: 电动雪地车制造商 Taiga Motors 申请债权人保护
item.description: 电动雪地车制造商 Taiga Motors Corp. 在停止汽车生产和裁员三个月后，申请债权人保护，以寻求重组。【原文：Electric snowmobile maker Taiga Motors Corp. filed for creditor protection as the Quebec company seeks to restructure, three months after it halted vehicle production and pared its workforce.】

item.title: 法国大选期间商业不确定性激增
item.description: 法国央行的月度调查显示，由于企业担心投资和劳动力成本可能飙升，法国企业的不确定性在大选期间激增。【原文：French business uncertainty surged during snap elections as firms worried about investment and the potential for labor costs to jump, according to the central bank’s monthly survey.】

item.title: 联邦援助日渐减少，小额贷款市场面临早期信贷问题
item.description: 随着联邦大流行病援助的逐渐减少，4 万亿美元市政债券市场的信用质量正显示出压力的早期迹象，这也促使人们预期近年来评级上调的速度将快于下调的速度。【原文：Credit quality in the $4 trillion municipal bond market is showing early signs of pressure as federal pandemic aid winds down, spurring expectations that the rapid pace of rating upgrades over downgrades in recent years will ease.】

item.title: 维托尔与 SK 就加州燃料操纵调查达成和解，赔偿 5000 万美元
item.description: 加利福尼亚州总检察长称，在指控大宗商品交易商 Vitol 和 SK Energy Americas Inc.【原文：California’s attorney general said it reached a $50 million settlement with commodity traders Vitol and SK Energy Americas Inc. after it alleged the firms acted together to manipulate local gasoline markets.】

item.title: 中国购买第一批美国大豆用于 2024 年作物种植— 晚了约七个月
item.description: 作为世界上最大的大豆进口国，中国首次购买了下一季的美国大豆。【原文：China, the world’s largest importer of soybeans, made its first purchase of US soybeans for the upcoming season — months later than usual.】

item.title: 西班牙央行推迟宣布下任央行行长人选
item.description: 西班牙经济部长卡洛斯-奎尔波（Carlos Cuerpo）取消了原计划在议会宣布的下一任西班牙银行行长人选。【原文：Spanish Economy Minister Carlos Cuerpo has canceled a planned announcement in parliament on the next Bank of Spain chief.】

item.title: 据称法国农业信贷银行将牵头竞购法国兴业银行旗下汉萨银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）正在就可能收购法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）旗下德国消费金融业务汉萨银行（Hanseatic Bank）一事进行深入谈判。【原文：Credit Agricole SA is in advanced talks on a potential acquisition of Societe Generale SA’s German consumer-finance business Hanseatic Bank, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国大亨贾塔尼亚准备收购脱离管理的美体小铺
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由英国大亨迈克-贾塔尼亚（Mike Jatania）牵头的一个财团即将达成收购陷入困境的英国化妆品零售商美体小铺（The Body Shop）的协议。【原文：A consortium led by British tycoon Mike Jatania is nearing a deal to buy struggling UK cosmetics retailer The Body Shop out of administration, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 到 2029 年，非洲稀土将占全球供应量的 9
item.description: 非洲矿山的稀土产量将从目前的零攀升至五年后的全球近十分之一，从而在由中国主导的市场中创造新的参与者。【原文：African mines could account for nearly a 10th of the world’s rare earths in five years, climbing from zero today, creating new players in a market dominated by China.】

item.title: Incora 法官称 2.5 亿美元融资存在缺陷，并询问现在该怎么办
item.description: Silver Point Capital 和债券巨头太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Silver Point Capital and bond giant Pacific Investment Management Co. will soon learn whether they will get nothing for putting together a controversial, $250 million rescue package for a Platinum Equity-backed aerospace parts supplier in 2022.】

item.title: 俄罗斯人在 7 月利率会议前面临食品和燃料成本上升问题
item.description: 俄罗斯的物价连续第六个月加速增长，凸显了中央银行在抑制通货膨胀方面所面临的困难，这几乎保证了决策者将在 7 月份的会议上上调关键利率。【原文：Price growth in Russia accelerated for the sixth straight month, underscoring the headwinds the central bank has faced in curtailing inflation and all but guaranteeing policymakers will hike the key rate at their July meeting.】

item.title: 贝莱德押注英国股票，因为工党获胜预示稳定
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）的策略师表示，工党在大选中取得压倒性胜利，标志着一个政治动荡不大的时代的开始，英国股市将吸引海外投资者回流。【原文：The UK stock market is set to lure back offshore investors after Labour’s landslide election victory signaled the start of an era of little political upheaval, according to strategists at BlackRock Investment Institute.】

item.title: 前德意志银行交易员操纵 Libor 罪名洗清，银行诉讼终结
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的一名前交易员因操纵 Libor 基准利率而被定罪，后来又洗脱了罪名，他在指控德意志银行为使他被起诉而做出虚假和误导性陈述的诉讼中达成和解。【原文：A former Deutsche Bank AG trader who was convicted and later cleared of charges that he rigged the Libor benchmark rate settled his lawsuit accusing the bank of making false and misleading statements to get him prosecuted.】

item.title: ADM 聘用 3M 首席财务官，陷入困境的交易商寻求恢复正常状态
item.description: 阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. — working to put a accounting scandal behind it — has hired a 3M Co.【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. — working to put an accounting scandal behind it — has hired a 3M Co. executive to oversee its finances and help restore its credibility with shareholders.】

item.title: 智利为锂电池组件赢得美国税收减免待遇
item.description: 智利与美国达成协议，允许将一种关键的电池组件计入美国《通货膨胀削减法案》规定的税收抵免中，从而增强了在这个南美国家投资的吸引力。【原文：Chile reached an agreement with the US to allow a key battery component to count toward tax credits under the US Inflation Reduction Act, boosting the appeal of investing in the South American nation.】

item.title: 马克龙呼吁实现广泛多数，将极左和极右势力拒之门外
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙呼吁国内代表 "共和力量 "的党派参与谈判，以建立一个多数派，因为一个月前他召集的临时大选使法国议会分为三个集团，无法立即建立一个稳定的执政集团。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron called on parties that represent the ‘republican forces’ in the country to engage in talks to build a majority after the snap election he called a month ago left France with a parliament divided into three blocs and no immediate path toward a stable governing group.】

item.title: 夏威夷电力公司因毛伊岛火灾和解计划报告而大涨
item.description: 夏威夷电气工业公司（Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc.）的涨幅创下 10 个月来最大，因为当地一家新闻机构报道称，毛伊岛野火引发的所有索赔和诉讼的解决方案正在毛伊岛县议会推进中。【原文：Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc. rose the most in 10 months after a local news outlet reported that a settlement resolving all claims and lawsuits over the Maui wildfires was advancing through the Maui County Council.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉大亨西斯内罗斯与 PDVSA 合作成立新石油公司
item.description: 委内瑞拉商业大亨里卡多-西斯内罗斯（Ricardo Cisneros）与委内瑞拉国家石油公司（Petróleos de Venezuela SA）签署了一项协议，政府将对能源行业的控制权更多交给私人合作伙伴。【原文：Venezuela business mogul Ricardo Cisneros signed a deal with Petróleos de Venezuela SA as the government offers greater control of the energy industry to private partners.】

item.title: 比索高估阻碍阿根廷大豆销售

item.title: 美国养老金准备在大涨之后囤积公司债券
item.description: 分析师和顾问说，美国公司养老金准备将数十亿美元转入企业信贷，此前几个月的股市上涨和债券收益率提高已使他们现金充裕。【原文：US company pensions are poised to shift billions of dollars into corporate credit, after months of stock-market gains and higher bond yields have left them awash with cash, analysts and advisers said.】

item.title: 安哥拉将出售从大亨手中没收的标准银行股份
item.description: 根据一项总统令，安哥拉计划出售安哥拉标准银行（Standard Bank de Angola SA）的少数股份。【原文：Angola plans to sell a minority stake in Standard Bank de Angola SA that was controlled by a former insurance tycoon who is serving a nine-year prison term, according to a presidential decree.】

item.title: 波兰决策者对央行行长 2026 年的赌注表示怀疑
item.description: 几位波兰央行行长表示，随着通胀的消退，他们可能会在明年开始权衡降息事宜，而行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）出人意料地将宽松预期延长至2026年的提议则被搁置一旁。【原文：Several Polish central bankers said they could begin weighing an interest-rate cut next year as inflation subsides, brushing aside Governor Adam Glapinski’s unexpected bid to stretch easing expectations into 2026.】

item.title: 肯尼亚斯坦比克公司（Stanbic Kenya）看到十倍资本规则将行业减半
item.description: 据 Stanbic Holdings Plc 公司称，肯尼亚计划将银行的最低核心资本提高十倍，这可能会使东非国家的贷款机构数量减少一半，因为其中一些企业会合并业务。【原文：Kenya’s plan to increase the minimum core capital for banks ten-fold could half the number of lenders in the East African nation, as some of these businesses merge their operations, according to Stanbic Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 科三润滑油部门 Moove 秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 巴西企业集团 Cosan SA 旗下的 Moove 润滑油控股公司已秘密申请首次公开募股。【原文：Moove Lubricants Holdings, a unit of Brazil conglomerate Cosan SA, has filed confidentially for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 斯普罗特称新铜基金规模太小，不会带来市场风险
item.description: 斯普罗特公司（Sprott Inc.）表示，其购买和持有实物铜的新基金规模太小，不会对这种工业金属的全球供应量产生影响，尽管大约十年前该公司曾试图推出类似产品，但引起了争议。【原文：Sprott Inc. says its new fund to buy and hold physical copper will be too small to have an impact on global availability of the industrial metal, despite past controversy over attempts to launch similar products about a decade ago.】

item.title: Pimco 警告称信贷市场回报无法弥补风险
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Investors are being insufficiently compensated for the risks of lending in the credit market as more capital chasing too few opportunities curbs returns, according to Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 飓风风险促使一家加勒比银行为其财务做好防灾准备
item.description: 上周，飓风贝里尔横扫加勒比海，使小岛屿国家政府急于为数十亿美元的损失寻找资金。【原文：Hurricane Beryl ripped through the Caribbean last week, leaving small island governments rushing to find funds for the billions of dollars in damages.】

item.title: 中国监管机构将收紧股票交易规则以加强监管
item.description: 中国证监会正在收紧对卖空、高频交易和证券借贷的规定，以打击不当套利行为，维护市场稳定。【原文：The China Securities Regulatory Commission is tightening rules on short selling, high-frequency trades and securities-lending in a bid to crack down on improper arbitrage and maintain market stability.】

item.title: 新西兰住宅建筑成本十多年来首次下降
item.description: 新西兰房屋建筑成本在至少 12 年来首次出现下降，主要原因是供应链中断情况有所缓解，材料成本下降，以及利率上升导致需求减弱。【原文：New Zealand house-building costs fell for the first time in at least 12 years, led by a drop in material costs as supply chain disruptions ease as well as weaker demand due to elevated interest rates.】
